title: Payment
virtualProductPoint1: 1. Purchase indicates you have read and agreed to {{modelServiceAgreement}} and {{userPrivacyPolicy}}.
virtualProductPoint2: 2. Virtual products are non-refundable and non-transferable.
stripeCheckoutHint: We could not create a card payment in this environment. Continue in Stripe Checkout instead.
stripeError: Unable to confirm the payment. Please try again.
stripeProcessing: Payment is still processing. We will update the order shortly.
stripeRequiresMethod: The payment method was declined. Please try a different card.
stripeMissingPublishableKey: Stripe publishable key is not configured.
stripeResultPending: We will sync your order once Stripe finishes processing.
stripeResultRedirectCountDown: Taking you back to the course in {{seconds}}s...
stripeResultMissingOrder: We couldn't find the matching order. Please reopen the chat or contact support.
